item.title: Orchestrator
item.description: Orchestrator Someone who makes things happen in the underworld.

item.title: index
item.description: Gempaign This section of notes is specifically related to a TTRPG campaign run within the Crystalborne setting.

item.title: Aetheric Conclave
item.description: Aetheric Conclave A location once seen as a religious epicenter since Commonization but gained popularity and power during the Renaissance.

item.title: Trinity Kingdom
item.description: Trinity Kingdom A still-standing nation established before Commonization only grown more powerful from the investments of gem families.

item.title: Deepcrystal Enclave
item.description: Deepcrystal Enclave A nation residing in the Scar that prides itself over its rapid research and mastery over Gems.

item.title: Modernization
item.description: Modernization The discoveries of the Renaissance launched civilization into a new era littered with new creations based on hardlight.

item.title: Gem Generation
item.description: Gem Generation The Gems created through Crystallization are denoted as a subsequent generation. These gems are weaker than the previous generation.

item.title: Origin Gem
item.description: Origin Gem An early generation Gem, These are highly sought after and scarce in the Modern era known for their immense power.

item.title: Resilience
item.description: Resilience A measure of matterâ€™s intrinsic resistance to Strain. Dependent on gem-type. Inorganic matter generally has a higher resilience.

item.title: index
item.description: Crystalborne How to Explore Folders are simply used to declutter the space.
